Just a general current temperature for the park.

I currently can't retrieve live weather data directly. For an accurate and up-to-date temperature in Fahrenheit at the Grand Canyon, I recommend checking a reliable weather website like the National Weather Service or your favorite weather app, using "Grand Canyon National Park, AZ" as your location.
